---
title: 基于成都超算环境的 DCU 环境申请 SOP
---

# {{ $frontmatter.title }}

首先登陆到 `login` 界面，我们可以看到我们可以访问的队列 `normal`。

![image.png](https://ruinique-alibaba-oss.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/202509081517177.png)

随后我们进入 `EShell` 可以看到我们的登录节点基本什么都没有。

输入 `sinfo` 查看可用节点：

```shell

diting            up   infinite     42   idle c02r1n[03,05,09-10],c02r2n16,c02r4n[13-15],c03r3n02,c03r4n[13-16,19],c04r1n01,c04r3n[02-09,15,17-18],c05r1n[04,12,14,17],c05r2n[17-19],c05r4n00,c06r2n[06-08],c06r3n11,c08r2n[06-07],c14r4n04,c15r3n15
cae               up   infinite      1  alloc c12r1n10
cae               up   infinite    102   idle c12r1n[00-09,11-14,16-19],c12r2n00,c12r4n[10-19],c13r1n[00-01,03-11,13-19],c13r2n[12-19],c13r3n[00-04,06-14,16-19],c13r4n[00,02-03],c14r2n[01-19],c14r3n[00-06]
forecast_bug_1    up   infinite     81   idle g01r03n03,g01r04n[01,03],g01r05n[05,07],g01r10n[03,07],g03r08n[00-03],g03r09n02,g04r01n02,g06r03n[00-07],g06r05n[01,04-07],g06r06n[05-06],g06r08n[00-07],g06r10n[00-03],g06r11n[02-05],g07r04n[02-07],g07r05n[00-05],g08r01n[06-07],g08r02n[05-07],g08r03n[00,03-07],g08r04n[00-07],g08r06n[06-07],g08r10n[06-07],g08r11n[03-04]
tf803             up   infinite      1  drain b15r4n00
tf803             up   infinite     39   idle b15r4n[01,11-15,17-19],b16r1n[00-18],b16r2n[02-03,05-08,10-12],b16r3n[12-13]
```

我们可以发现在 `PARTITION = normal` 且 `STATE = idle` 的有这么一行：

```
normal*           up   infinite   1303   idle a01r2n13,a02r2n[00-01,03-04,09,17],a02r3n07,a02r4n00,a03r2n[00,14-19],a03r3n[00-05,07,16],a03r4n[01,04-13],a04r1n05,a04r2n06,a04r4n01,a05r1n[17-19],a05r2n[00-04,18],a05r4n[10,15],a06r1n[16-19],a06r2n[00-13,15-19],a06r3n10,a06r4n[06-09,12,18],a07r2n[00,11-12,14],a07r4n[07-11],a08r1n[06-14],a08r2n[10,12-13],a08r3n07,a09r2n[05-09,11-13],a09r3n[01-07,09-19],a09r4n[00-19],a10r1n[00-12],a10r2n[00-03,06-09],a10r3n[00-19],a10r4n[00-04],a11r1n[18-19],a11r2n[00-06,08-19],a11r3n[00-06,08-19],a11r4n[00-15,17-19],a12r1n[00-19],a12r2n[00-16],a12r3n[11-19],a12r4n[00,03-08,12-19],a13r1n[00-04,11-17],a13r2n[12-13],a13r3n[03-10],a13r4n[07,09,13-19],a14r1n[00-19],a14r2n[00-19],a14r3n[00-08],a14r4n[08-14,18-19],a15r1n[00-16],a15r2n[01-19],a15r3n[00-01,07-10,17-19],a15r4n[00-19],a16r1n[00-04,09-15],a16r2n[04-19],a16r3n[00-11,13-19],a16r4n[00-02],b01r1n[01-19],b01r2n[00-19],b01r3n[00-11,13-19],b02r1n[13-14],b02r2n[05-16],b02r4n[00-19],b03r1n[00-07,09-17,19],b03r2n[00-19],b03r3n[00-07,09-17],b04r1n[10-17],b04r2n[02-07,09-17],b04r3n[00-08,12,17-18],b04r4n[14-19],b05r1n[00-04,06-19],b05r2n[00-10],b05r3n[03-15,18-19],b05r4n[00-01,08,10,12-19],b06r1n[00-02,05-19],b06r2n[00-08],b06r4n[18-19],b07r1n[00-06],b07r2n[04-08,12-19],b07r3n[00-19],b07r4n[00-06,08-16,18-19],b08r1n[00-01],b08r4n[14-15],b09r1n[00-04,06-17,19],b09r2n[00-10,12-19],b09r3n[02-19],b09r4n[00-19],b10r1n[00-17],b10r2n04,b10r3n[04-11],b10r4n[00-08,19],b11r2n[17-19],b11r3n[00-09,11-19],b11r4n[00-11],b12r4n[00-02,04,06-12,14,16-17],b13r1n[00-19],b13r2n[00-07,09-10,13-17],b13r4n[00-11,18-19],b14r4n01,b15r2n[15-16],c01r1n[18-19],c01r4n[06-13],c03r3n[08-09,13-15,18-19],c03r4n[00,02-03,09-10],c05r1n[06-11,18],c07r1n[15-19],c07r2n[11,13-14,16,18-19],c07r3n[00-01,03],c08r1n[08-15],c08r2n[11-19],c08r3n[00-19],c08r4n[00,03-07],c09r2n[00-06,08],c09r3n[06-13],c09r4n[13-19],c10r1n[00,02-05],c10r2n[12-19],c10r3n[08-19],c10r4n[00-03,11-18],c11r1n[01-07,09,11-17],c11r2n[00-01,03-05,07-09,13-16,18-19],c11r3n[00-01],c12r2n[03-05,07],c12r3n[07-19],c12r4n[00-02],c14r3n[07-10],c14r4n[06-13],c15r2n[02-03,05-08],c16r2n[02-05,07-15,17-18],c16r3n[18-19],c16r4n[00-03,05-06]
```

这些全是空闲节点，我们随便挑几个节点看一下资源情况：

```shell
scontrol show node a01r2n01
```

就可以看到节点的信息：

```shell
NodeName=a01r2n01 Arch=x86_64 CoresPerSocket=8 
   CPUAlloc=4 CPUTot=32 CPULoad=2.32
   AvailableFeatures=(null)
   ActiveFeatures=(null)
   Gres=dcu:Hygon:4(S:0-3)
   NodeAddr=10.1.1.22 NodeHostName=a01r2n01 Version=20.11.8-1.6.0-20230414
   OS=Linux 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Oct 25 22:34:08 UTC 2019 
   RealMemory=126500 AllocMem=102400 FreeMem=94902 Sockets=4 Boards=1
   MemSpecLimit=10240
   State=MIXED ThreadsPerCore=1 TmpDisk=0 Weight=1 Owner=N/A MCS_label=N/A
   Partitions=normal 
   BootTime=2025-03-31T09:25:14 SlurmdStartTime=2025-03-31T09:59:04
   CfgTRES=cpu=32,mem=126500M,billing=32,gres/dcu=4
   AllocTRES=cpu=4,mem=100G
   CapWatts=n/a
   CurrentWatts=0 AveWatts=0
   ExtSensorsJoules=n/s ExtSensorsWatts=0 ExtSensorsTemp=n/s
   Comment=(null)
```

这就是一个四卡的机器，目前给我们开的权限是只有申请四卡的节点，可以挑一个没有占用的节点先 `salloc` 上去，例如下面的节点。

```shell
NodeName=c16r2n02 Arch=x86_64 CoresPerSocket=8 
   CPUAlloc=0 CPUTot=32 CPULoad=0.09
   AvailableFeatures=(null)
   ActiveFeatures=(null)
   Gres=dcu:Hygon:4(S:0-3)
   NodeAddr=10.3.16.23 NodeHostName=c16r2n02 Version=20.11.8-1.6.0-20230414
   OS=Linux 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Oct 25 22:34:08 UTC 2019 
   RealMemory=126500 AllocMem=0 FreeMem=108090 Sockets=4 Boards=1
   MemSpecLimit=10240
   State=IDLE ThreadsPerCore=1 TmpDisk=0 Weight=1 Owner=N/A MCS_label=N/A
   Partitions=normal 
   BootTime=2025-07-11T09:41:57 SlurmdStartTime=2025-07-17T10:11:01
   CfgTRES=cpu=32,mem=126500M,billing=32,gres/dcu=4
   AllocTRES=
   CapWatts=n/a
   CurrentWatts=0 AveWatts=0
   ExtSensorsJoules=n/s ExtSensorsWatts=0 ExtSensorsTemp=n/s
   Comment=(null)
```

申请的命令参考：

```shell
salloc -p normal -N 1 --nodelist=c16r2n02 --gres=dcu:4 --exclusive --time=04:00:00
```

接下来 `squeue` 就可以看到对应的节点已经申请下来了

```shell
             JOBID PARTITION     NAME     USER ST       TIME  NODES NODELIST(REASON)
          46453822    normal interact ruinique  R       0:05      1 c16r2n02
```

然后我们直接在登陆节点

```shell
ssh c16r2n02
```

然后再（成都超算没有 hy-smi)

```shell
rocm-smi
```

我们就可以拿到看到对应的 GPU 信息了。

![e8fdad2bdfb19d9379bdbfdfc83c8e92.jpg](https://ruinique-alibaba-oss.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/202509081536096.png)

Z100 机器的命令是

```shell
salloc -p wzhdexclu05 -N 1 --nodelist=b03r1n14 --gres=dcu:4 --exclusive --time=04:00:00
```
